-- HELP --

Setting doses is very simple. First add a new medicine. It will redirect you to edit your medicine.
 a) Member: Select the member for whom you want to track this medicine.
 b) Medicine Name: Enter the name of the medicine.
 c) Dose: Enter the amount of dose you have been prescribed.
 d) Take every(days): Enter the interval (in days) as prescribed. If the medicine is to be taken daily, the interval should be 1, and so on..
 e) Start From: Enter the date on which you started/will start taking the medicine.
 f) Next, you can add as many number of doses for a day as you want.

For example, say you want to take 2 tablets of 'X' medicine at 9:00AM and 9:00PM on alternate days starting 24-Mar-2013, then your inputs should be as follows:
 Medicine Name - X
 Dose - 2 tablet(s)
 Take every(days) - 2
 Starting - 2013-03-24
 Dose1 - 09:00:00
 Dose2 - 21:00:00
 Set Notification ON

Further features:
 1. You can also add notes to your medicine (an option available in the Edit Medicine page).
 2. You can manually add a missed dose in the Missed History page
 3. A medicine will turn light-red if it is due in less than 2 hours.
 4. You can add multiple members for whom you can track medicines individually.

Notification Options:
 1. Touching notification accepts the dose.
 2. Skip - Skip the dose. This dose will be added to the 'Missed History' page.
 3. Snooze - Snooze the dose by 10 minutes(customizable from settings).

Available Settings:
 1. Set custom snooze duration(default = 10 minutes).
 2. Set custom notification tone(default = Android default notification tone).
 3. Set vibrate yes/no on notification.
 4. Set LED light yes/no on notification.
